body:
Hello HB family



I know that HB has great capabilities, that I might not be aware of. I would like to ask if it is possible to run parametric runs on E+ variables, such as:

1- U-value of walls, windows

2- Lighting Power Density

3- HVAC system



and other variables, which are basically assigned to the model via E+. 



Thank you very much for your help



Ladan

replies.body:
Why not?

This is very possible.

-A.
Yes. Yes. Yes.  Energy models have hundreds of variables that you can play around with.

Thank you Abraham and Chris. I will start looking at example files to find some examples. 



Ladan
